titleStmt.title: Dr Wild's humble thanks for His Majesties gracious declaration for liberty of conscience, March 15. 1672.
titleStmt.author: Wild, Robert, 1609-1679.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "No, not one word, can I of this great deed ..."
With reference to Charles II's declaration of 15 March 1672.
Item at A4:2[242] imperfect: torn at foot with loss of imprint.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
